attributes.action: Yes or No Scottish Develution - no fudging
attributes.additional_details: The only question asked of all Scots or those resident should be 'Do you want total independence from the UK 'Yes or No'? Any other form of question  should require the consent of the English, Welsh and Ulster residents. Absolutely no financial aid should be given to Scotland if the result is a 'Yes' vote. They must not be allowed to use the UK pound as their currency and the UK should not defend them or represent them in any way. Scotland is not a EU member the UK is. and they will have to apply to join.
